title: 77. AITC: Nature, The Posthuman, and the Microbiome with Ilaria Mazzoleni
itunes:title: 77. AITC: Nature, The Posthuman, and the Microbiome with Ilaria Mazzoleni
description: This week we continue our ongoing miniseries Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with architect, biomimicist and educator Ilaria Mazzoleni. In this chat we see that the “eco-laboratory” is an apt metaphor to describe the body, architecture, and manifestations of “living” at various scales.
